Take-Two Interactive Software, Inc. (NASDAQ: $TTWO ) have received a $190 price target from KeyBanc. And KeyBanc analyst Tyler Parker reiterated an “Overweight” rating on the shares.

Parker pointed out that the potential of a new GTA release in 2023 is likely to continue to drive momentum in the stock. And KeyBanc looked back at history to see how it performed in prior cycles and offered several insights.

“The stock clearly outperformed on larger news days teasing or confirming GTA V in the lead-up to launch. The cumulative analysis from reveal to launch actually shows underperformance during the period, but it’s heavily influenced by a broader video games sector selloff in 2011/2012. If we attempt to adjust for the selloff, which we would argue has already happened coincidentally this time around, the year prior to launch saw TTWO stock move +53% relative to the Nasdaq at +12% over the same period,” wrote Parker in a research note.
